So the answer is - bounty date TBA.Whitepaper release date TBA.And if you keep asking stupid questions, I'll introduce you to my ax and boots.  I swear by my beard!Take it easy, men. Take it easy.I'm sure YOU HAVE to be polite, if you want to succeed.And you DEFINITELY won't scare me with a toy axe and children's boots)I'm polite enough for a dwarf who is forced to explain simple things. And don't you dare insult my axe! It may seem small to you, but the main thing is to know how to use it!

comments.author: Laurendaldin
comments.body: Hey guys, don't want to interrupt such, khm... an intence conversation, but am I only one, who think that it's too similar with other card games? Or it's something between card game and casino?

comments.author: Eridan_world
comments.body: Quote from: Laurendaldin on October 05, 2022, 05:56:52 PMHey guys, don't want to interrupt such, khm... an intence conversation, but am I only one, who think that it's too similar with other card games? Or it's something between card game and casino?Well Eridan is not like an ordinary card game, where you and your opponent just lay out cards in turn, nooo, because you, longdude, can immerse yourself in an alternative metaverse and become its inhabitant. Look at the cards, they're beautiful, don't you think so? And you're wrong about the casino, dah. Yes, there is an element of randomness in the game, but where is it not? Even walking through the forest, you can stumble upon an elf. Only in our case, you can influence on random and increase your chances of success because of elixirs, for example. So, there is no need to compare us with someone, longdude.

comments.author: davidspitzer
comments.created_time: October 06, 2022, 02:14:59 PMLast edit: October 07, 2022, 04:21:37 AM by davidspitzer
comments.body: Quote from: Eridan_world on October 06, 2022, 10:51:41 AMQuote from: davidspitzer on October 06, 2022, 05:34:10 AMQuote from: Laurendaldin on October 05, 2022, 05:56:52 PMHey guys, don't want to interrupt such, khm... an intence conversation, but am I only one, who think that it's too similar with other card games? Or it's something between card game and casino?I bet that bearded beauty will somehow dodge the answer again!Well, I get it, you're just jealous that even my mother has a beard. I  think, longdude, even your armpits are so shiny that I can look in them like a mirror, if I decide to shave.Keep your sick fantasies about my armpits to yourself, little dwarf.You'd better tell me how to make money with Eridan.Aside from trading your mom, of course)

comments.author: Eridan_world
comments.body: Quote from: davidspitzer on October 06, 2022, 02:14:59 PMQuote from: Eridan_world on October 06, 2022, 10:51:41 AMQuote from: davidspitzer on October 06, 2022, 05:34:10 AMQuote from: Laurendaldin on October 05, 2022, 05:56:52 PMHey guys, don't want to interrupt such, khm... an intence conversation, but am I only one, who think that it's too similar with other card games? Or it's something between card game and casino?I bet that bearded beauty will somehow dodge the answer again!Well, I get it, you're just jealous that even my mother has a beard. I  think, longdude, even your armpits are so shiny that I can look in them like a mirror, if I decide to shave.Keep your sick fantasies about my armpits to yourself, little dwarf.You'd better tell me how to make money with Eridan.Aside from trading your mom, of course)Leave my mom alone,  she's already starting to get ready for a date, iYKwIM! Well, in the glorious kingdom of Eridan, everyone can replenish their pocket in different ways. Someone will mine gold in the deep mine, which can be sold profitably. Someone will try their luck in the Chasm, funded outlandish gizmos, gold and who knows what else can be found there. Someone will  crafting potions and other items useful in the campaign, which are so necessary for adventurers. Well, don't forget about the state funds, of which even the most inveterate idler will get his piece of pie, and the more merit he has, the bigger the piece'll be. So stop staring at my beard, think better about becoming one of the inhabitants of our kingdom!

comments.author: Laurendaldin
comments.body: Quote from: Eridan_world on October 06, 2022, 10:51:16 AMQuote from: Laurendaldin on October 05, 2022, 05:56:52 PMHey guys, don't want to interrupt such, khm... an intence conversation, but am I only one, who think that it's too similar with other card games? Or it's something between card game and casino?Well Eridan is not like an ordinary card game, where you and your opponent just lay out cards in turn, nooo, because you, longdude, can immerse yourself in an alternative metaverse and become its inhabitant. Look at the cards, they're beautiful, don't you think so? And you're wrong about the casino, dah. Yes, there is an element of randomness in the game, but where is it not? Even walking through the forest, you can stumble upon an elf. Only in our case, you can influence on random and increase your chances of success because of elixirs, for example. So, there is no need to compare us with someone, longdude.Well... thanks? You really think all this dwarven stuff is suitable on such forum? My armpits have not yet been shown such close interest, so... OK, it's not a casino, but how does the NFT fit into the concept? Do you think that NFTs have real value at all?? There are different opinions about this.

comments.author: Eridan_world
comments.body: Quote from: Laurendaldin on October 07, 2022, 02:58:01 PMQuote from: Eridan_world on October 06, 2022, 10:51:16 AMQuote from: Laurendaldin on October 05, 2022, 05:56:52 PMHey guys, don't want to interrupt such, khm... an intence conversation, but am I only one, who think that it's too similar with other card games? Or it's something between card game and casino?Well Eridan is not like an ordinary card game, where you and your opponent just lay out cards in turn, nooo, because you, longdude, can immerse yourself in an alternative metaverse and become its inhabitant. Look at the cards, they're beautiful, don't you think so? And you're wrong about the casino, dah. Yes, there is an element of randomness in the game, but where is it not? Even walking through the forest, you can stumble upon an elf. Only in our case, you can influence on random and increase your chances of success because of elixirs, for example. So, there is no need to compare us with someone, longdude.Well... thanks? You really think all this dwarven stuff is suitable on such forum? My armpits have not yet been shown such close interest, so... OK, it's not a casino, but how does the NFT fit into the concept? Do you think that NFTs have real value at all?? There are different opinions about this.Why do you think my life is nonsense? Or do you have any prejudices against dwarves? Why are we still discussing this?NFT is part of the gameplay, part of the game economy. They'll help you get more wealth inside the game, which you'll be able to replenish your wallet in your pocket in result. But the NFT itself also has its own cost. Even more, they have value as a work of art. For some reason, no one argues about the value of candy wrappers, which deteriorate over time, just lie in the table and bring nothing.

comments.author: Laurendaldin
comments.body: I respect your Dwarven identity, don't worry about it  OK, I understand your position on NTF, then another question. You say that elixirs will be needed to receive rewards. Does this mean that I will have to invest money in the game? You position it as "top up your wallet", but invest?

comments.author: Eridan_world
comments.body: Quote from: Laurendaldin on October 12, 2022, 10:04:28 AMI respect your Dwarven identity, don't worry about it  OK, I understand your position on NTF, then another question. You say that elixirs will be needed to receive rewards. Does this mean that I will have to invest money in the game? You position it as "top up your wallet", but invest?Exactly, don't be rude with the dwarf if you don't want to get to know his axe. Well, longdude, it is not necessary to invest something. Our king is so generous that every inhabitant of Eridan can get a piece of the pie. Thanks to this, even you will be able to buy potions for yourself, and who knows, maybe you'll save up for the alchemy laboratory and brew up some poitions yourself. As you see, there are opportunities for everyone.

comments.author: Laurendaldin
comments.body: Quote from: Eridan_world on October 13, 2022, 01:44:21 PMQuote from: Laurendaldin on October 12, 2022, 10:14:44 AMQuote from: davidspitzer on October 09, 2022, 01:01:52 PMQuote from: Laurendaldin on October 07, 2022, 03:06:58 PMQuote from: davidspitzer on October 06, 2022, 05:34:10 AMQuote from: Laurendaldin on October 05, 2022, 05:56:52 PMHey guys, don't want to interrupt such, khm... an intence conversation, but am I only one, who think that it's too similar with other card games? Or it's something between card game and casino?I bet that bearded beauty will somehow dodge the answer again!Maybe it's the beard that prevent him from speaking directly? Grows right into his brain, kind of I heard that dwarfs use beards to replace their wives. Sounds creepy. But has anyone seen their wives?They say dwarves are very progressive in this regard and asking their gender is intolerant. So we can only assume...At least you're right about something. But still... Why are you so interested in my beard? Maybe she attracts you? Maybe you want to try something new? Maybe I want to, but I think my bald armpits won't be your type

comments.author: davidspitzer
comments.body: What about WP? What about BOUNTY?Give me clear answer!!!

I don't have an exact date, but as soon as everything is ready, I'll tell you everything. Will you leave me alone now? Or are you going to keep asking stupid questions?

comments.body: Clear answers dont create chaos! I just want to plan my activities cause i really like that project - but not that dude thinking that he is a real dwarf.
